app_summary: The application implements a hotel reservation service, built with Go and gRPC. The initial project is extended in several ways, including adding back-end in-memory and persistent databases, adding a recommender system for obtaining hotel recommendations, and adding the functionality to place a hotel reservation.
RCA_gt: The geo service is failing to start because it is misconfigured to connect to the MongoDB database on port 27777, whereas the database is actually listening on the default port 27017. This port mismatch causes the application to fail initialization with a "no reachable servers" error, leading the pod to crash and enter a CrashLoopBackOff state.
